channel.title: Stencil Modules on Stencil
channel.description: Recent content in Stencil Modules on Stencil

item.title: Use Stencil Modules
item.description: Prerequisite Go modules are required for stencil. For more information about Go Modules, see: https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/Modules https://blog.golang.org/using-go-modules Initialize a New Module Use stencil create templaterepository to initialize a new Stencil Module. If it fails to guess the module path, you must provide it as an argument, e.g.: stencil create templaterepository github.com/myorg/repo
